subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*(t)s(j)aŋ||clear; pure; clean}}; cognate with {{cog|bo|གཙང||clean; pure}}, {{cog|lus|thiang||to be clear; to be clean; to be pure}}, {{cog|qxs||ɕó}}, {{cog|duu|cangma|'''cang'''ma|clean}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}; STEDT).

Perhaps an {{w|Mainland Southeast Asia linguistic area|areal}} word; compare {{cog|mkh-pro|*caŋ||to glitter}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[clear]]; [[limpid]]
# [[clean]]; [[unstained]]
# [[pure]]; [[unmixed]]
# [[distinct]]; [[clear]]; [[apparent]]
# [[fair]] and [[honest]]; [[upright]]
# [[quiet]]; [[still]]
# {{lb|zh|phonetics}} [[unaspirated]]
# to [[clear]] (throat, etc.); to [[clean]]
# to [[settle]]; to [[sort out]]
# {{zh-div|朝}} {{w|Qing dynasty}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
